00022 void VecSetStats::init() {
00023     cumullen_ = 0;
00024     sum_.clear();
00025     avg_.clear();
00026     shortestlen_ = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
00027     longestlen_ = -1;
00028 }
00029 
00030 void VecSetStats::handle(const std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<Vector3d> >& data) {
00031     // reset any previous values
00032     init();
00033 
00034     // initialize temporary vars
00035     double veclen;
00036 
00037     // parse the array and update the values
00038     int n = data.size();
00039 
00040     for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {
00041         boost::shared_ptr<Vector3d> vec = data[i];
00042         veclen = vec_len(*vec);
00043 
00044         if (cfg_ & (SUM||SUMNORM||SUMLEN))
00045             // update sum_
00046             sum_ += *vec;
00047 
00048         // update shortest_
00049         if ((cfg_ & (SHORTEST||SHORTEST_LEN)) && (veclen < shortestlen_)) {
00050             shortestlen_ = veclen;
00051             shortest_ = *vec;
00052         }
00053 
00054         // update longest_
00055         if ((cfg_ & (LONGEST||LONGEST_LEN)) && (veclen > longestlen_)) {
00056             longestlen_ = veclen;
00057             longest_ = *vec;
00058         }
00059 
00060         // update cumullen_
00061         cumullen_ += veclen;
00062     }
00063 
00064     if (cfg_ & (SUMNORM||SUMLEN)) {
00065         // update sumlen_
00066         sumlen_ = vec_len(sum_);
00067 
00068         // update sumnorm_
00069         if (cfg_ & SUMNORM) {
00070             sumnorm_ = sum_;
00071             sumnorm_[0] /= sumlen_;
00072             sumnorm_[1] /= sumlen_;
00073             sumnorm_[2] /= sumlen_;
00074         }
00075     }
00076 
00077     if (cfg_ & (AVG||AVGNORM||AVGLEN)) {
00078         // update avg_
00079         avg_ = sum_;
00080         avg_[0] /= n;
00081         avg_[1] /= n;
00082         avg_[2] /= n;
00083 
00084         // update avglen_
00085         avglen_ = vec_len(avg_);
00086 
00087         // update avgnorm_
00088         if (cfg_ & AVGNORM) {
00089             avgnorm_ = avg_;
00090             avgnorm_[0] /= avglen_;
00091             avgnorm_[1] /= avglen_;
00092             avgnorm_[2] /= avglen_;
00093         }
00094     }
00095 }

00141 const double VecSetStats::vec_len(const Vector3d & vec) const {
00142     return sqrt(vec[0]*vec[0] + vec[1]*vec[1] + vec[2]*vec[2]);
00143 }
00144 
00145 const std::string VecSetStats::to_string(const Vector3d & vec) const {
00146     std::ostringstream o;
00147     o << "(" << vec[0] << "," << vec[1] << "," << vec[2] << ")";
00148     return o.str();
00149 }
00150 
00151 const std::string VecSetStats::to_string() const {
00152     if (cfg_==0)
00153         return "";
00154 
00155     std::ostringstream o;
00156     if (cfg_ & SUM)
00157         o << "sum:" << to_string(sum_) << ", ";
00158     if (cfg_ & SUMLEN)
00159             o << "sumlen:" << sumlen_ << ", ";
00160     if (cfg_ & SUMNORM)
00161         o << "sumnorm:" << to_string(sumnorm_) << ", ";
00162     if (cfg_ & AVG)
00163         o << "avg:" << to_string(avg_) << ", ";
00164     if (cfg_ & AVGLEN)
00165         o << "avglen:" << avglen_ << ", ";
00166     if (cfg_ & AVGNORM)
00167         o << "avgnorm:" << to_string(avgnorm_) << ", ";
00168     if (cfg_ & SHORTEST)
00169         o << "shortest:" << to_string(shortest_) << ", ";
00170     if (cfg_ & SHORTEST_LEN)
00171         o << "shortestlen:" << shortestlen_ << ", ";
00172     if (cfg_ & LONGEST)
00173         o << "longest:" << to_string(longest_) << ", ";
00174     if (cfg_ & LONGEST_LEN)
00175         o << "longestlen:" << longestlen_ << ", ";
00176     if (cfg_ & CUMUL_LEN)
00177             o << "cumullen:" << cumullen_ << ", ";
00178 
00179     return o.str().substr(0, o.str().size()-2);
00180 }
